title: Bug 114903: Default values are not shown in Show Report Parameters' dialog
OB: Default values are not shown in the Show Report Parameters' dialog.
EB: When I preview the report and click the 'Show Report Parameters' button, I expect to see the default values in the value boxes. This allows me to easily modify the parameter that I want to change.
SR:
1. Preview the report.
2. Click the 'Show Report Parameters' button.
3. Verify that the default values are displayed in the value boxes.
4. Modify the desired parameter.
5. Check that the changes are applied correctly.
